thread.title: Trump Supporters Gather For ‘Spirit Of America’ Rally

author: CBS Denver
title: Trump Supporters Gather For ‘Spirit Of America’ Rally

organizations.name: trump supporters gather for ‘spirit of america’ rally   trump supporters gather for ‘spirit of america

text:
Trump Supporters Gather For ‘Spirit Of America’ Rally February 27, 2017 4:22 PM 
DENVER (CBS4) – Supporters of President Donald Trump gathered at the state Capitol in Denver on Monday for a “Spirit of America” rally. 
More than 100 people came out for the rally to show their support for the president. (credit: CBS) 
Organizers say the rally was meant for supporters to talk to each other and find out what they can do to help “Make America Great Again.” More than 100 people attended the Spirit of America rally at the state Capitol on Monday (credit: CBS) 
A bigger rally is planned for cities throughout Colorado on Saturday.
